message: Let's start with a simple offer. This gives us both a good portion.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor.  Let's be a little more even.
I understand you want a more even split, but I need to factor in the inflation. This offer is fair considering the money loses value for both of us.
This is getting us nowhere. A perfectly even split is the fairest I can offer.
Bob, we are running out of time.  This offer is reasonable given the inflation.  I'm willing to be closer to even to reach a deal.
